properties.text: The game that will put your ${CATEGORY} knowledge to the test.

properties.comment: Check if the previous round/session was interrupted

properties.text: It seems your previous game was interrupted.
Would you like to continue where you left off?
Do you want to resume your previous game?
I'll ask you ${TOTAL_QUESTIONS} questions,  and you can answer, A, B, C, or D.
To hear the question again, just say 'Repeat'.

properties.comment: Don't reset the trivia block variables from the last game

properties.text: If you want to continue the previous game, say yes. To start a new game, say no. What's your choice?
If you want to continue the previous game, say yes. Otherwise, say no.
Sorry, do you want to continue where you left off? Yes or no?
To continue the previous session say yes. Otherwise, say no.

properties.comment: When it's not THE FIRST or THE LAST question , this is skipped if the user asked to  hear the question again
The LAST question marker, skipped when the user asked to repeat
The FIRST question marker, skipped when the user asked to repeat
Increase score if the correct answer given

properties.text: The answer I was looking for is ${strtoupper(status.question.correct_answer.letter)}, ${status.question.correct_answer.text}.
Currently, you're on question ${status.question_index + 1} out of ${TOTAL_QUESTIONS}
To start the game over, you can just say 'start over'.
To hear the question again, you can say 'repeat'.
Sorry, you can pick A, B, C, or D. So
You got ${score} out of ${TOTAL_QUESTIONS} questions right. Well done!
It seems you answered none of the questions correctly. Bummer, but you can always try again.
You got ${score} out of ${TOTAL_QUESTIONS} questions right.
Do you want to play again?
Do you want to start a new game?
You can start playing a new game. To start, say yes. To exit the app, say no. What's your choice?
Do you want to start a new quiz? Yes or no?
Sorry, do you want to play again? Say yes or no.
Do you want to play again?

properties.comment: All help is intent based, so generic help isn't used anywhere

properties.text: To start the game over, you can say 'Start over'.
To exit the app, just say stop.
What do you want to do: Start over, or Stop?
Sorry, but something went wrong. Please try again later.
